DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this multi-center study is to explore the efficacy, safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of recombinant human C1 inhibitor in the treatment of acute attacks in patients with hereditary angioedema.
DOC.brief_title: Recombinant Human C1 Inhibitor for the Treatment of Acute Attacks in Patients With Hereditary Angioedema
DOC.criteria: Main inclusion Criteria: Clinical and laboratory diagnosis of HAE Plasma level of functional C1INH of less than 50% of normal Severe attack of abdominal, facialoropharyngeal, genitourinary and/or peripheral HAE. Main exclusion Criteria: Acquired angioedema Pregnancy or breastfeeding Participation in another clinical study within prior 3 months
